content.p: As an international student we understand you have even more to think about as you prepare to start with us at Nottingham.This section is dedicated to you. We cover all the extra bits you need to know as an international new starter, from applying for your visa to deciding what to pack, and how to plan for your journey. Our world is always moving. Be part of it at the University of Nottingham Be part of our world. A world of possibility, where great minds grow together. A global community, home to staff and students from over 150 countries. Explore our courses Discover how we can support you, from scholarships to visa guidance. Find out about English entry requirements, presessional courses and our IELTS Centre. There are dedicated webpages for international students, inclusing country-specific webpages, where you can find information specifically for students from your country: index Join our Facebook community Follow us on Instagram Head to X for latest news and events With a community of over 40,000 students from more than 150 countries, the University of Nottingham is a truly global university, with campuses in the UK, Malaysia and China.
